CLD-0103.treatment: moved to higher airflow zone, withheld watering, increased humidity monitoring

CLD-0112.environment: dark shelf ~15ft from window, <40 µmol ambient light

CLD-0113.notes: mint, white, and green variegation tracked for persistence

CLD-0114.notes: grown in custom Cladari soil mix in self-watering pot; nutrients: TPS One, Silica Boost

Lineage_CLD-X001.status: first genetically logged F1 Cladari pair

glossary_updates.Leaf Axil: Angle between the upper side of a leaf/petiole and the stem; common site of new growth or pests.
glossary_updates.Node: The point on a stem where leaves or petioles emerge.
glossary_updates.Internode: The segment of stem between two nodes.
glossary_updates.Chimeric Mutation: A mutation affecting only some tissue layers, often causing variegation or mosaic expression.
glossary_updates.Somaclonal Variation: Genetic variation that arises during tissue culture propagation, sometimes stable.
